name: Magik

abilities.name: Soulsword Strike
abilities.details: Attacks with her mystical Soulsword, which deals bonus damage to shields/constructs.

abilities.name: Stepping Disc
abilities.details: Creates a teleportation disc, instantly moving to the target location.

abilities.name: Limbo Blast
abilities.details: Unleashes a blast of energy from the Limbo dimension in front of her.

ultimate.name: Darkchylde Transformation
ultimate.effect: Transforms into Darkchylde for 10s: Gains increased damage, lifesteal, Eldritch Armor regen. Summons a minor Limbo demon to fight alongside.

passives.name: Eldritch Armor
passives.details: Generates stacks of Eldritch Armor (up to 3?) when dealing damage. Each stack provides minor damage reduction. Stacks decay over time.

passives.name: Soulsword
passives.details: Basic attacks deal significantly increased damage to shields and deployables.

teamups.effect: Stepping Disc cooldown reduced when teleporting near specified allies.

lore: Illyana Rasputina, the younger sister of Colossus, was trapped in the demonic dimension Limbo where she became a powerful sorceress and learned to wield the Soulsword. She rules Limbo and can create teleportation 'stepping discs'.
